title: EVRART / COFFEE TABLE
description: a quick table interaction where you find a different key card to get out of the harbour at night.

dialogueTree.title: Coffee Table: "A large table with two huge vacuum-..."
dialogueTree.text: A large table with two huge vacuum-insulated thermal coffee dispensers. Someone has forgotten a small plastic card next to the stacks of cups.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Peer into a discarded coffee cup!"
links.text: Peer into a discarded coffee cup!

links.title: You: "Look into one of the old coffee cup..."
links.text: Look into one of the old coffee cups.

links.title: Coffee Table: "You see nothing exceptional. It's a..."
links.text: You see nothing exceptional. It's a dirty cup, smudged brown, with old ground coffee stuck to the bottom... slowly getting mouldy.

links.title: You: "What am I supposed to see here?"
links.text: What am I supposed to see here?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Look closer!"
links.text: Look closer!

links.title: Coffee Table: "If you squint your eyes enough the..."
links.text: If you squint your eyes enough the coffee grounds almost seem to make up two letters: F... and K.

links.title: Inland Empire: "It's a clue!"
links.text: It's a clue!

links.title: You: "A clue of what?"
links.text: A clue of what?

links.title: Inland Empire: "A clue about the person behind all..."
links.text: A clue about the person behind all the murders.

links.title: Logic: "Yeah. Of course. It's certainly not..."
links.text: Yeah. Of course. It's certainly not just an example of *par√©idolie*, noticing patterns in noise. Worth it.

links.title: Inland Empire: "It's meaningful, I *swear*! You jus..."
links.text: It's meaningful, I *swear*! You just wait... I've got the case nearly busted wide open.

links.title: You: "It *is* a sign! Just like a remote..."
links.text: It *is* a sign! Just like a remote viewer would operate. Signs hidden inside the mundane...

links.title: Inland Empire: "You got it, pal. I would *never* ma..."
links.text: You got it, pal. I would *never* make such a thing up.

links.title: You: "Uh-huh, great. I somehow doubt old..."
links.text: Uh-huh, great. I somehow doubt old coffee is how the police solve investigations.

links.title: Logic: "You would be correct."
links.text: You would be correct.

links.title: Inland Empire: "If you can't trust your own eyes, w..."
links.text: If you can't trust your own eyes, who can you trust? Certainly not Kim. He's so... suspicious.

links.title: Inland Empire: "If you can't trust your own eyes, w..."
links.text: If you can't trust your own eyes, who can you trust...

links.title: You: "Huh, okay. Thanks, this certainly w..."
links.text: Huh, okay. Thanks, this certainly wasn't a waste of time.

links.title: Coffee Table: "You throw the cup back into the tra..."
links.text: You throw the cup back into the trash bin.

links.title: You: "Pick up the card."
links.text: Pick up the card.

links.title: Coffee Table: "You snatch up the red plastic card...."
links.text: You snatch up the red plastic card. It features a black contour of a crane lifting a container. The name 'Etienne Hogarth' is written in the middle, below it in smaller text: 'Member of the board'. It comes with a magnetic strip -- meant to open electronic doors.

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]
